bug.author: andrewcoh
bug.summary: TestPerception3d test fails Window->Test Runner with 3D ball scene loaded
bug.description:
The unit test TestPerception3d fails (Window->Test Runner) with 3D ball scene loaded. To reproduce on branches master or develop:
Load 3D ball scene Window->Test Runner Run all.

comments.comment:
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/andrewcoh>@andrewcoh</denchmark-link>
I'll look into this one.
